data.title: The Federal Reserve orders a new round of stress test for U.S. banks
data.text: The Federal Reserve orders a new round of stress test for U.S. banks due to the economic impacts of COVID-19

data.title: Goldman, JPMorgan face coronavirus cases after workers return to the office
data.text: Goldman Sachs reportedly discovered two of its employees have tested positive for Covid-19.

data.title: Fed Reveals 'Mid-Cycle' Stress Test Scenarios for Major Banks
data.text: The Federal Reserve will test 34 major banks under two hypothetical scenarios to check the capital and liquidity adequacy amid the coronavirus concerns.
